function isValidUrl(url) {

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;

function trim(input) {

return ”;

}

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:38 UTC – Details)

From the brand

YGYQZ: Make your mood neat

Storage shelf or bags bring us simple life

4 styles available

4 styles available

How did we get our start?

When I work in the office, I am often too busy to organize the items on the desktop, so that I spend a lot of time looking for the items I want. This feeling makes me very crazy, so I have designed many products, which tidy up my desktop, what’s more, beautify my office as an office decor.

What makes our products unique?

We have spent a long time conducting research, and combined with numerous customer feedback, we continue to improve and update our products. We have always been in the forefront, and we believe that we do better!

Why do we love what we do?

For efficiency

USPTO certified product

Solely designated patent for YGYQZ

Give your books a home: Is there nowhere to put your books, after a while, the book will fall apart, then your books become crumpled, with this small desktop bookshelf, your books will be able to maintain a new look
Saving desktop space in office: Are you still troubled by the clutter of your desk, using our desktop bookshelf can relieve your problems and make your desk tidy and look comfortable
Lightweight and easy to install: Thanks to the simple design, our desktop small bookshelf can be easily installed and disassembled and can be switched horizontally and vertically, you can decide to let the books lie down or stand at will
Perfect adjustable size: 25.6× 6.7× 15.1 in
Quality assurance: If there is a quality problem with the product,we will give you a refund,no need to return,if there is damage caused by non-human factors within 12 months,we will refund it for free
Since it is a factory direct sale, if there are scratches, please ask for replacement
If parts are missing, please ask for replacement
If there is no installation instruction, you can watch our video or ask us for directions


Cartoon cloud pattern bookshelf


Suitable for your books, pens, etc.

Give your books a place to put them, and you can also store some of your little items, so a simple desktop is no longer boring, and cluttered books are tidy. Providing the most comfortable learning office environment for people.We are committed to creating high-quality cloud pattern bookshelf, each of cloud pattern bookshelf has passed the test of time, you will enjoy a convenient and pleasant shopping experience.

New black cloud bookshelf




black cloud

Save your messy desktop.

black cloud side

Decorate your office or kitchen, everywhere you need to decorate is suitable

black cloud front

Make everything just organized

Read more



High quality cloud pvc board


Rounded design

Rounded corner grinding design, your child won’t get hurt.

You can extend it to make it longer or keep it shorter. It works perfectly on my office desk. Probably going to get one for home bathroom too.

  • Super easy to put together (literally took you about 5 minutes if that)
  • They are sturdy, though they may not look like it at times but i have a lot of heavy books on it so its ganna wobble a bit when they fall against the side. Its perfect for what i need it for.

High quality cloud pvc board

Features

Four patterns of bookshelves to choose

Durable

Simple

Waterproof

Cute

Easy assemble

Durable

Free stretch

  • Materials: PVC board
  • Style: Bear pattern, fawn pattern,white cloud pattern, black cloud pattern
  • Weight: 1.84 kg
  • Color: black, white
  • Size: 25.6× 6.7× 15.1 in
  • Box size: 15.98 x 9.41 x 3.39 in

Read more

High quality buyer’s show





Buyer’s picture1

For decorative tools and small things.

it serves its purpose as a cute shelf on my mom’s kitchen counter. She lives in a tiny space and this helps her to have more counter space for her various kitchen items. Relatively sturdy so far and easy to assemble.

Buyer’s picture2

For toys and dolls.

Easy instructions, I am using it to organize my dresser. Works well as I can adjust length. I haven’t finish organizing it, but it’s holding up my plushies as I finish organizing my closet. Easy to use and very sturdy!

Buyer’s picture3

For pens, plants and cosmetic.

Adorable. Holds my office supplies and cute decorations and doesn’t take up a ton of space on my desk. I love the adjustability of it.

Buyer’s picture4

For something to eat or use.

We wanted something clean looking that wasn’t made of metal. This looks great in our kitchen and there is no signal blockage. Super easy to put together.

Read more


Two colors available

  • Black is noble, white is innocence
  • The two colors match, your house or office will be more stylish

Read more

item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $22.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:28 UTC – Details)



Aesthetic Design- Stylish rectangle shape with linear wire design, round edging along top rim prevents scratches. Smooth metal streamlines and rounded angles design protect your desktop from scratch. Stackable capabilities increase and utilize vertically-stored space to maximize your desktop workspace.
Stackable File Tray- Stackable design allows you to stack them together or put them to different places separately. 4 tier trays satisfy your need of sorting files, no worry about cluttered desktop anymore.
Durable and Sturdy Construction – Durable material and Electroplating technique give it a sturdy metal construction and smooth shiny metal outlook. Electroplating surface has the advantages of anti-oxidation, anti-corrosion, anti-rust, anti-wear, can effectively extend the service life.
Perfect Gift Choice- This Rose Gold Letter Tray is the most beautiful gift you could possibly give to anyone. Perfect gift for colleagues, teachers, friends. Elegant rose gold look lights up the personal home office space instantly, girls would love it.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:08:53 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Lzeodo

The Lzeodo is an enterprise specializing in the production and selling of power tools holder. We are committed to providing excellent products and services. Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this power tools storage. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours.

LZEODO POWER TOOL ORGANIZER

SPECIFICATIONS

Drill Organizer Rack*1

Wrench *1

Screws *12

Screws Nut *12

Screwdriver Holder *2

Expansion Nails Plug *3

Expansion Nails *2

The upper layer used to storage tools and hand drills. The middle layer is for charging stations, battery, tool box etc. The 4 drill hanging slots are for power drills, saws etc. The side racks are for pliers and hammers.

Screwdriver Organizer

There are more than 10 holes in the tool rack, which can store screwdrivers of different sizes. Very convenient for your access.

Easy to Assemble

Just need to connect the gauge steel wire and plating with screws and hang it on the wall according to the instructions.

4 Drill Holders

Friendly design with 4 drill holders. It can store cordless drills, brush less drills,small corded drills,impact driver drills.

MADE FOR MOST TOOL ORGANIZATION: This tool organizer adopts unique multifunctional storage design with 15 holes for screwdrivers holder, 4 racks for pliers storage and two flat shelves to place other power tools. This tool storage helps you keep all your commonly used project tools neatly organized and within your arm’s reach.
THICKEN HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: Compared with other utility racks which made of thin wire, our drill holder has greater bearing capacity. It is made of thicken heavy compact steel metal, and the joint of the shelf uses a reinforced design. This shelf is strong enough to withstand a person of 50kgs.
REMOVABLE AND EASY TO INSTALL: The power tool organizer has a simple structure and easy to move. It comes with wrench, drywall anchors and pan head screws. It takes only a few minutes to install it, just need to drill holes and install screws. The installation guide is provided for you to check.
WIDE RANGE OF USES: Our power tool organizer wall mount is perfect to organize all kinds of garage stuff. And it’s widely used as screwdriver organizer, electric drill charging station and Father’s Day gift. It’s suitable for garage, tools room warehouse and so on due to its perfect size.
SATISFACTION SERVICE: Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this drill holder wall mount. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours. And we offer a 1-year guarantee on this product. Don’t worry about it.

Lzeodo

The Lzeodo is an enterprise specializing in the production and selling of power tools holder. We are committed to providing excellent products and services. Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this power tools storage. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours.

  • The middle layer is for charging stations, battery, tool box etc.
  • The 4 drill hanging slots are for power drills, saws etc.

From the brand

Protect Your Tools

The Ryker Bag was Created to be an Accessible and Affordable Brand that Makes Every Manual Laborer’s Life Easier for Efficiency, Organization and Transport.

We’ve Taken Everything we Know About Tools and Created the Most Compact and Most Convenient Roll Up Bag that we know how.

Now it’s Your Turn to Enjoy the Benefit of our Vast Experience and the Expertise of the Designers who Put this Dream into Action!

Shop The Ryker Bag

Compact Design for More Tools – we’ve Developed a Tool Roll Bag of a Perfect Size – you’d Be Surprised by How Many Tools Fit in This Small Tool Bag : Place Wrenches Pliers Ratchets and More Into this Roll Up Tool Pouch
6 Pockets for All your Gear – This Roll Organizer has 4 Compartments for Tools & 2 Detachable + D Loops – a Unique Feature in Case You Need to Carry Smaller Items Like Drill Bits Screws & Spare Parts
Premium Quality & Ultra Durable Materials – This Roll Up Tool Bag is Made from Premium Materials – Rust Proof Zippers , Quality Straps with Reliable Buckles and a Water , Grease & Rip Resistant Heavy Duty Fabric , Strong as a Canvas Tool Roll – This Toll Roll Will Keep Your Tools Safe in Extreme Work Conditions
Easy to Carry & Hang – Keep your Tools & Accessories Organized and Carry Them in a Folded Roll Up Organizer – Hang The Tool Bag Organizer in Your Car Garage or Workshop
A Great & Useful Gift – This Tool Roll Organizer is a Must Have for any Skilled Workman ; Mechanic Repairman Carpenter Plumber Electrician & Hobbyist – The Wrench Roll Up Pouch can be Used as a Car / Motorcycle Tool Roll for Repairs or Emergency Kit – Don’t Miss a Chance to Buy a Gift that will Surely be Appreciated

The Ryker Bag was Created to be an Accessible and Affordable Brand that Makes Every Manual Laborer’s Life Easier for Organization and Transport.

We’ve Taken Everything we Know About Tools and Created the Most Compact and Most Convenient Roll Up Bag that we know how.

Now it’s Your Turn to Enjoy the Benefit of our Vast Experience and the Expertise of the Designers who Put this Dream into Action!

NEW 6 TOOL POUCHES DESIGN

  • 4 Long Pockets 11.8 x 3.3” with Heavy Duty Zippers for all your Tools, Cables, Cutters, and More.
  • 2 Short Removable Pockets 5.3 x 3” to House all those Little Bits & Pieces that so Easily get Lost. This Includes Nuts, Bolts, Screws, Anchors and More.
  • Each Small Tool Pouch comes with a D-clip which you can Clip onto your Pants or Belt for Super Convenience.

When it comes to Work Tools, you Need a Light-Weight, Compact, but Spacious Tools Bag to Organize and Carry them, and you Surely want it to be Sturdy and Safe. This is why we Designed the Ryker Tool Bag to Suit all your Tool Handling Needs, Packed it with Neat Features and Manufactured it from Premium Heavy-Duty Materials!

We Call it a Small Tool Roll Because it’s Certainly Smaller than the Average Tool Box but at 20.3” in Length and 12.8” Wide, this Handy Roll Up Tool Bag Provides you with all the Space you Need to Organize and Carry your Tools, Accessories, Cords, and any other Gear you may Need in your Day’s Work.

SUPER DURABLE – A TOOL BAG MADE FOR LIFE

FABRIC TO PROTECT

  • Made of heavy-duty 1000D fabric
  • Water resistant
  • Grease retardant
  • Rip resistant

Protect your work gear from harmful agents at work such as rust & dirt to keep them in the best condition for longer.

FOLD IT ANY WHICH WAY

Designed with your convenience in mind, there are many ways you can fold and carry the tool roll organizer. For this purpose there are several handles so you can carry your tools with maximum ease.

EXTREME ATTENTION TO DETAIL

  • All zippers are rust-proof and of the highest quality
  • Stitching is done with thick nylon thread
  • All straps and buckles are designed to make life easier for you.

Read more

LIMITLESS POSSIBILITIES FOR PROFESSIONALS, DIYers, STUDENTS & HOBBYISTS

ALL YOUR ESSENTIAL HAND TOOLS IN ONE PLACE

Safely store your wrenches, pliers, screwdrivers and more. No more running back to the car or the garage to find that missing tool.

CAR/BIKE REPAIR TOOLS

Save space in the back of your car with this compact tool option. You’ll never find yourself left out in the cold and without the necessary tools to fix your bike or car.

STUDENTS & HOBBYISTS

No more bulky and unsuitable bags. Arrive at your lesson or work spot, open up your Ryker roll up bag and see everything you need right in front of you.

GEEKS & TECHIES

Every possible

computer cable, part and accessory at your fingertips where you need it and when you need it. Organize & store for absolute control.

Read more

MORE GREAT FEATURES INCLUDE:

  • Metal Grommets to hang the bag when open on the wall
  • Additional outer D-Rings on which you can attach keys, tape measure and other small items
  • Mesh pocket on the front side. Place your name tag with telephone number so there’s no chance of you losing the bag and your precious tools.

Read more

4.5

NEW 6 TOOL POUCHES DESIGN

  • 4 Long Pockets 11.8 x 3.3” with Heavy Duty Zippers for all your Tools, Cables, Cutters, and More.
  • 2 Short Removable Pockets 5.3 x 3” to House all those Little Bits & Pieces that so Easily get Lost. This Includes Nuts, Bolts, Screws, Anchors and More.
  • Each Small Tool Pouch comes with a D-clip which you can Clip onto your Pants or Belt for Super Convenience.

When it comes to Work Tools, you Need a Light-Weight, Compact, but Spacious Tools Bag to Organize and Carry them, and you Surely want it to be Sturdy and Safe. This is why we Designed the Ryker Tool Bag to Suit all your Tool Handling Needs, Packed it with Neat Features and Manufactured it from Premium Heavy-Duty Materials!

We Call it a Small Tool Roll Because it’s Certainly Smaller than the Average Tool Box but at 20.3” in Length and 12.8” Wide, this Handy Roll Up Tool Bag Provides you with all the Space you Need to Organize and Carry your Tools, Accessories, Cords, and any other Gear you may Need in your Day’s Work.

SUPER DURABLE – A TOOL BAG MADE FOR LIFE

FABRIC TO PROTECT

  • Made of heavy-duty 1000D fabric
  • Water resistant
  • Grease retardant
  • Rip resistant

Protect your work gear from harmful agents at work such as rust & dirt to keep them in the best condition for longer.

FOLD IT ANY WHICH WAY

Designed with your convenience in mind, there are many ways you can fold and carry the tool roll organizer. For this purpose there are several handles so you can carry your tools with maximum ease.

EXTREME ATTENTION TO DETAIL

  • All zippers are rust-proof and of the highest quality
  • Stitching is done with thick nylon thread
  • All straps and buckles are designed to make life easier for you.

Read more

LIMITLESS POSSIBILITIES FOR PROFESSIONALS, DIYers, STUDENTS & HOBBYISTS

ALL YOUR ESSENTIAL HAND TOOLS IN ONE PLACE

Safely store your wrenches, pliers, screwdrivers and more. No more running back to the car or the garage to find that missing tool.

CAR/BIKE REPAIR TOOLS

Save space in the back of your car with this compact tool option. You’ll never find yourself left out in the cold and without the necessary tools to fix your bike or car.

STUDENTS & HOBBYISTS

No more bulky and unsuitable bags. Arrive at your lesson or work spot, open up your Ryker roll up bag and see everything you need right in front of you.

GEEKS & TECHIES

Every possible

computer cable, part and accessory at your fingertips where you need it and when you need it. Organize & store for absolute control.

Read more

MORE GREAT FEATURES INCLUDE:

  • Metal Grommets to hang the bag when open on the wall
  • Additional outer D-Rings on which you can attach keys, tape measure and other small items
  • Mesh pocket on the front side. Place your name tag with telephone number so there’s no chance of you losing the bag and your precious tools.

Read more

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:07:56 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Vtopmart is dedicated to creating a better home life for every family.

Our Vision:

To pursue a better life and enjoy it, we are committed to providing various well-designed, high-quality, practically household products with fashionable concepts and innovative design to make your home full of warmth and love.

Vtopmart Drawer Organizer

Explore More Categories

Fit Multi Occasions

Make Everything Organized —- These clear versatile drawer dividers trays are perfect for any place in your home. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity / bathroom / kitchen / office drawers, ideal for organizing cosmetics, makeup tools, hair accessories, jewelry, office supplies, craft supplies, utensils, etc.
Combination of 4 Different Sizes —- One set includes 25pcs storage bins in 4 different sizes, which makes you can customize combinations to store items and organize drawer for your specific needs. Includes: 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs), 9 x 3x 2 inches(6pcs), 6 x 3 x 2 inches(8pcs), 3 x 3 x 2 inches(8cps).
Non-Slip and Durable —- Extra 200pcs silicone pads are included, just stick them on the bottom of the plastic trays for non-slip. Made of durable and clear plastic, so you can see what’s in it without digging around or making a mess, help you get a neat lifestyle.
Stackable Design —- Organize all your items and then stack these bins into one other, that will save much space especially when you have a narrow drawer. Use these trays to separate your messy drawer, you will find it’s so easy to keep things neat and tidy.
Easy to Clean —- Our desk drawer storage bins are easy to be wiped clean with a damp cloth and perfect for keeping everything in its place. Convenient for use in your daily life, make everything look beautiful and better organized.

Read more

4 Size Combination

Variety of sizes help make the organization of different items more flexible and easier. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity, bathroom, kitchen and office drawers

Non-Slip Design

Silicone pads at the bottom of the bin prevent the box from moving when dragging the drawer, always keep things in their own place.

Built to Last

Made of durable and transparent plastic, built to last. Clear bins make you can see everything in them when pulling a stack of them out of a drawer.

Package Include:

  • 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs)
  • 9 x 3x 2 inches (6pcs)
  • 6 x 3 x 2 inches (8pcs)
  • 3 x 3 x 2 inches (8cps)

Read more

Multi Purpose

Organize Makeup

Fit perfectly for your vanity drawer, for organizing cosmetics, makeup tools, hair accessories, nail polish, and more.

Organize Office Supplies

Convenient for storing small items such as pencils, stationery and so on, helping you to save space. Make your desk look more neatly and cleanly.

Organize Kitchen Utensils

Ideal for organizing forks, spoons, steak knives in your kitchen, allow you to keep everything handy for meal prep and cooking.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $15.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:07:40 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Car Armrest Cover

[Product Specifications] Color: Black Brown. Size: about 13″ * 8″ * 2″ Material: Made of high quality PU and memory foam material. Durable, scratch and stain resistant[Easy to install] The armrest cover is designed with elastic bands and the edges are also processed with rubber bands. Place the armrest on the top and pull down to fine-tune the armrest[Comfortable Padding] Soft and comfortable one-piece quick rebound memory foam padding makes it easy to relax your elbows, arms, wrist armrests, wrist rests[Stain Resistant & Easy to Clean] Protect your car armrest box from spills, scuffs and sticky fingers.[Features] Armrest console pad with excellent stability and body pressure distribution for easy use between the driver and passenger seat. Fits various seat armrests

Note: This car armrest cushion is sized to fit most cars on the market, please measure your car console before placing your order.

This car armrest cushion is made of pure memory foam so your elbow will get comfortable supports when you put your arms on this car console pad.The inner memory foam will recover soon because of its high elasticity when your put arms upon it for long time.It will relax your elbow pain and bring you comfortable driving feelings.The armrest cushion pad adds about 2.2 inches on your car console.

Size: The size of the armrest covering cover is 12.5*8.4*2 inch which fits most popular cars

You don’t need worry about water or coffee leaving stains on your car console. No matter sweat, soda or coffee something else. This car armrest cushion surface is waterproof so you can use wet wipes to clean this armrest pad up easily.The premium outer leather can prevent scratches from your dog or cat so they will not damage your car console when they are in your car.

If you drive your car for long hours every day, then this quality car armrest pad will be the optimal choice for you.

If the armrest slips, please use transparent double side adhesive tape to add stability.

Not only the driver can enjoy the soft comfort of this car armrest pad, but also the person sitting on the passenger side can enjoy it together.

PERFECT DESIGN: Maximize your work area. The desktop whiteboard is designed to sit perfectly between a keyboard and monitor and is slope angled for comfortable reading and writing, or typing when you are using it as a keyboard stand.
SMOOTH WRITING & EASY TO WIPE: TSJ OFFICE mini desktop computer pad comes with a smooth and durable temple glass dry erase writing surface. This white board allows you to write and wipes clean with ease over and over. Our easel whiteboard always stays white and easy to read.
HIDDEN STORAGE & PAD/MOBILE TRAY: De-clutter your desk by storing markers, magnetic eraser and other desktop accessories in the opening drawer or place markers on the accessory tray for quick access. And one more long tray on the top of the dry erase white board for your pad or mobile.
BEST GIFT IDEA: Christmas gifts for men and women. Best Gift as a tabletop whiteboard, note taking supplies, desk to do list notepad, keyboard stand, desk organizer, memo board for Your Office, Home or Classroom! Both adult and child will like this premium small white board. The clear desk pad brings them better organization, teaching and learning without paper large wasting.
100% SATISFACTION AFTER-SALES SERVICE – Your satisfaction and happiness are our top priority. Our hassle-free customer service team will work hard to resolve any issues that you have with our whiteboard. If you’re not satisfied with your order, please contact with us, we promise to return your hard-earned money.
